name: 2D FENDER
description:
Hi, I'm Hotdog and this is my very first game!

2D FENDER is a top down survival android game which the player will need to defend the wizard for sixty seconds with a shield and nothing else. Fight back by bumping enemies into each other or just shove them away to survive!

FEATURES:

15 levels

3 unique boss fights

Powerups and skin upgrades
